enum_Statement_9.name: Statement
enum_Statement_9.content:
pub enum Statement {
    Assignment(Assignment),
    Drop(Drop),
    Traversal(Traversal),
    ForEach(ForEach),
    Literal(GenRef<String>),
    Identifier(GenRef<String>),
    BoExp(BoExp),
    Array(Vec<Statement>),
    Empty,
}
